title: Is Hurricane Irma on Track to Become a ‘Category 6’ Storm?
subtitle: A rumor that scientists would create a new hurricane category for Irma led people to believe that the storm had already received that designation.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Hurricane Irma is projected to be so big that it may become a "Category 6" hurricane; that a new "Category 6" will be invented specifically for Hurricane Irma
